text: é yeini masagi ná-pɛlɛi wu, é zeeli sɛʋɛ ɠɛ nui ná-botiɠɛ ʋɛlɛi wu. Nu wolaiti kpein ti ɠɛni gaalɛbai zu náʋɛ: zou zɛʋɛ ɠɛ nui Elisama ɠɛni ná, ta Delaya, Semaya ná-doun zunui, ta Ɛlɛnatan, Akaɓɔɔl ná-doun zunui, ta Gemalia, Safan ná-doun zunui, ta Sedesiyase, Ɠanania ná-doun zunui, é ɓɔ nu wolaiti pɛ ba.
